goalsets.set: <roi type="max" dose="60" note="Symptomatic necrosis <3%">Brain Brain Brain <roi type="max" dose="54" note="Permanent cranial neuropathy <5%">Brainstem <roi type="dx" volume="1cc" dose="59" note="Permanent cranial neuropathy <5%, 1-10cc">Brainstem <roi type="max" dose="64" note="Permanent cranial neuropathy <5%, point dose << 1 cc">Brainstem
